com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener

Class ComponentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener.ComponentAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentListener

    public class ComponentAdapter
extends Object
implements ComponentListener
    This adapter class can help you create component listeners that only needs a subset of the events required by the ComponentListener.
    Author:
    Martin

      ComponentAdapter()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onComponentInvalidated(Component component)
      Will be called when a component is signaling it's content has been invalidated and needs to be repainted by the GUI system.
      void onComponentLostFocus(InteractableComponent interactableComponent)
      Will be called when input focus was taken away from a component by the GUI system.
      void onComponentReceivedFocus(InteractableComponent interactableComponent)
      Will be called when a component has gained the input focus of the GUI system.
